name: lifeboatapi
description: Lua toolchain for Stormworks Microcontrollers and Addons, with LifeBoatAPI

lifeboatapi.stormworks.user.authorName.description: Enable the Stormworks: New Project option in the Explorer context menu

lifeboatapi.stormworks.user.workshopLink.description: Link to your steam workshop page

lifeboatapi.stormworks.user.extendedBoil.description: Any remaining boiletplate notice you wish to include at the top of the file.

lifeboatapi.stormworks.nelo.overwriteNel.description: True if you have a local copy of Nelo Lua docs you'd prefer to use (sometimes this extension may become out of date, and Nelo may update his docs sooner). See: https://github.com/Rene-Sackers/StormworksLuaDocsGen

lifeboatapi.stormworks.nelo.neloMicrocon.description: Local location of your microcontroller Nelo Lua Docs file - (if overriding; otherwise the bundled version in this extension is used) - (sometimes this extension may become out of date, and Nelo may update his docs sooner). See: https://github.com/Rene-Sackers/StormworksLuaDocsGen

lifeboatapi.stormworks.nelo.neloAddonDoc.description: Local location of your addon Nelo Lua Docs file - (if overriding; otherwise the bundled version in this extension is used) - (sometimes this extension may become out of date, and Nelo may update his docs sooner). See: https://github.com/Rene-Sackers/StormworksLuaDocsGen

lifeboatapi.stormworks.libs.projectSpeci.description:
(Per-project) Add absolute-paths to other projects or libraries, to use the lua from them. 
 These paths apply ONLY to this project.

lifeboatapi.stormworks.libs.workspaceLib.description:
(Shared within Workspace) Add absolute-paths to other projects or libraries, to use the lua from them. 
 These paths are shared for all projects in this workspace, avoiding the need to set each project up specifically

lifeboatapi.stormworks.libs.globalLibrar.description:
(Shared globally) Add absolute-paths to other projects or libraries, to use the lua from them.
 These paths are globally shared, for libraries you want to use every time without setting them up again.

lifeboatapi.stormworks.libs.ignorePaths.description: .gitignore style path patterns to ignore from intellisense and build processes.

lifeboatapi.stormworks.enableNewProjectC.description: Enable the Stormworks: New Project option in the Explorer context menu

lifeboatapi.stormworks.isMicrocontroller.description: (Recommended that you do not change this.) True if this project is a Stormworks Microcontroller project.

lifeboatapi.stormworks.isAddonProject.description: (Recommended that you do not change this.) True if this project is a Stormworks Addon project

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
